nml_option.name: config_use_IFHTracers
nml_option.description: if true, the 'IFHGRP' category is enabled for the run

nml_option.name: config_IFHTracers_limit_advection
nml_option.description: if true, the IFHTracers limiter for advection is on

nml_option.name: config_IFHTracers_normalize_by_layerThickness
nml_option.description: if true, the IFHTracers Tend variables are divided by layerThickness

nml_option.name: config_use_IFHTracers_surface_bulk_forcing
nml_option.description: if true, surface bulk forcing from coupler is added to surfaceTracerFlux in 'IFHGRP' category

nml_option.name: config_use_IFHTracers_surface_restoring
nml_option.description: if true, surface restoring source is applied to tracers in 'IFHGRP' category

nml_option.name: config_use_IFHTracers_interior_restoring
nml_option.description: if true, interior restoring source is applied to tracers in 'IFHGRP' category

nml_option.name: config_use_IFHTracers_exponential_decay
nml_option.description: if true, exponential decay source is applied to tracers in 'IFHGRP' category

nml_option.name: config_use_IFHTracers_idealAge_forcing
nml_option.description: if true, idealAge forcing source is applied to tracers in 'IFHGRP' category

nml_option.name: config_use_IFHTracers_ttd_forcing
nml_option.description: if true, transit time distribution forcing source is applied to tracers in 'IFHGRP' category

nml_option.name: config_use_IFHTracers_surface_value
nml_option.description: if true, surface value is computed for 'IFHGRP' category

nml_option.name: config_use_IFHTracers_sea_ice_coupling
nml_option.description: if true, couple IFH fields with sea ice

package.name: IFHTracersPKG
package.description: This package includes variables required to include IFHGRP.

package.name: IFHTracersBulkRestoringPKG
package.description: This package includes variables required to compute bulk restoring on the IFH tracer group.

package.name: IFHTracersSurfaceRestoringPKG
package.description: This package includes variables required to compute surface restoring on the IFH tracer group.

package.name: IFHTracersInteriorRestoringPKG
package.description: This package includes variables required to compute interior restoring on the IFH tracer group.

package.name: IFHTracersExponentialDecayPKG
package.description: This package includes variables required to compute exponential decay on the IFH tracer group.

package.name: IFHTracersIdealAgePKG
package.description: This package includes variables required to compute ideal age forcing on the IFH tracer group.

package.name: IFHTracersTTDPKG
package.description: This package includes variables required to compute transit-time distribution forcing on the IFH tracer group.

package.name: IRFTracerBudgetPKG
package.description: This package includes variables required to compute IFH tracer budget
